title: Private studio with 1 bathroom
posting_body: ['***MUST PROVIDE', 'THE FOLLOWING 2 ITEMS BELOW OR WE WILL NOT RESPOND TO YOUR INQUIRY***', 'ITEM #1.', 'Provide phone number to schedule an appointment', 'ITEM #2.', 'Provide a detailed description about yourself, such as; current occupation, attending school, and reason for moving.', 'PLEASE NOTE', 'THIS STUDIO HAS ROOM FOR ONLY ONE SINGLE INDIVIDUAL TENANT.', 'THERE WILL BE NO EXCEPTIONS FOR TWO TENANTS.', '(IDEAL FOR A COLLEGE STUDENT OR WORKING PROFESSIONAL)', 'Application procedure:', '1.', 'Current credit report', '2.', 'Professional/personal references and previous landlord reference', '3.', 'Last 2 months of pay stubs or other proof of stable income', '4.', 'Ideal candidate should be responsible, considerate, and respectful to others, clean friendly, and paying rent on time.', '$50 for late fee.', 'About this Studio:', 'This private cozy studio is a fully renovated, one story flat with a separate entry way.', 'Brand new private bathroom with sets of high quality faucet and finished with a gorgeous vanity.', 'Freshly coated walls with all new double pane glass windows and cordless blinds all around.', "Designer's choice of laminated flooring wrapped around the living space.", 'Gorgeous kitchenette with soft close cabinets and all new appliances.', 'Freshly assembled wardrobe to help organize your personal belongings.', 'Convenience:', 'Plenty of street parking in the safe neighborhood of Broadmoor Village and conveniently located to nearby public transportations.', 'Close proximity to Laundry Services, Daly City Westlake Shopping Center, Colma Bart Station, Daly City Bart Station, San Francisco State University, Serramonte Mall, Lake Merced', 'Requirement:', 'Rent is $1600/month; the lease is for 1 year and available by August 1st.', 'Security Deposit: $1600.', 'Move in cost $3200', 'Electricity, Water, Trash, and Wi-Fi Internet service are included in the rent.', 'No pets, drugs, smoking, sublease, overnight guests, and disruptive parties will not be tolerated.', 'Washer and Dryer are not included.', 'Read Less']
